name: Circuit Heist
description:
Circuit Heist is a strategic puzzle game prototype in which you hack into the electrical system of a building to guide a team of robbers through a heist. Manage your power carefully to operate cameras, doors, and exploding machines, and lead your team to loot and the exit at the end of each level.

Made for Pirate Jam 2020, based on the theme of "Uncertainty"
https://www.pirate-jam.com/

Controls:
Mouse - Move, left click to connect device, right click to disconnect
R - Restart Level

Special thanks to all those at Pirate Jam, as well as all the Pirate Jam Sponsors and organizers: @unity3d @kenneyNL @devolverdigital @free_lives @americanmcgee @TVPaint_Anim @LandfallGames
